episodes.content: What's going to happen in the next sumo tournament? Go behind the scenes and hear expert analysis on the upcoming season.
episodes.description: NHK WORLD-JAPAN looks back at an unprecedented year of Grand Sumo in 2020 and ahead to 2021. The show also reports on the yearend competition of amateur sumo wrestlers aiming to make their pro debuts.
episodes.subtitle: Review 2020
episodes.title: 2020 GRAND SUMO Review
